speaker: PANDER
text: Well, I had rather than twice the worth of her

text: she had ne’er come here.

speaker: BAWD
text: Fie, fie upon her! She’s able to freeze the god

text: Priapus and undo a whole generation. We must

speaker: BAWD
text: either get her ravished or be rid of her. When she

speaker: BAWD
text: should do for clients her fitment and do me the

speaker: BAWD
text: kindness of our profession, she has me her quirks,

speaker: BAWD
text: her reasons, her master reasons, her prayers, her

speaker: BAWD
text: knees, that she would make a puritan of the devil if

text: he should cheapen a kiss of her.

text: Faith, I must ravish her, or she’ll disfurnish us of

speaker: BOLT
text: all our cavalleria, and make our swearers priests.

text: Now the pox upon her greensickness for me!

speaker: BAWD
text: way to the pox.

speaker: BAWD
text: Here comes the Lord Lysimachus disguised.

speaker: BOLT

text: How now! How a

speaker: LYSIMACHUS
text: dozen of virginities?

speaker: LYSIMACHUS
